get.summary: List all airports and their corresponding cities
get.description: Retrieve a list of airports and the cities they are located in.

200.description: A JSON object containing airports and their cities

additionalProperties.description: City name corresponding to the airport

post.description: This endpoint allows you to book a flight reservation for a user with various flight details and passengers.

user_id.description: The ID of the user to book the reservation, such as 'sara_doe_496'.

origin.description: The IATA code for the origin city, such as 'SFO'.

destination.description: The IATA code for the destination city, such as 'JFK'.

flights.description: An array of objects containing details about each flight.

date.description: The date for the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '2024-05-01'.

passengers.description: An array of objects containing details about each passenger.

first_name.description: The first name of the passenger, such as 'Noah'.

last_name.description: The last name of the passenger, such as 'Brown'.

dob.description: The date of birth of the passenger in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '1990-01-01'.

payment_methods.description: An array of objects containing details about each payment method.

payment_id.description: The payment id stored in user profile, such as 'credit_card_7815826', 'gift_card_7815826', 'certificate_7815826'.

total_baggages.description: The total number of baggage items included in the reservation.

nonfree_baggages.description: The number of non-free baggage items included in the reservation.

200.description: The reservation was successfully booked and returned as a JSON object.

reservation_id.description: The unique ID of the reservation.

user_id.description: The user ID associated with the reservation.

origin.description: The IATA code for the origin city.

destination.description: The IATA code for the destination city.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a flight using the flight identifier.

origin.description: The IATA code for the origin city, such as 'SFO'.

destination.description: The IATA code for the destination city, such as 'JFK'.

scheduled_departure_time_est.description: Estimated scheduled detaprture time in HH:MM:SS format (24-hour clock).

scheduled_arrival_time_est.description: Estimated scheduled arrival time in HH:MM:SS format (24-hour clock).

post.summary: Calculate the result of a mathematical expression.
post.description: Evaluate the given mathematical expression and return the calculated result.

expression.description: The mathematical expression to calculate, such as '2 + 2'. The expression can contain numbers, operators (+, -, *, /), parentheses, and spaces.

schema.description: Result of the calculated expression. Could be a number or an error message.
Error message indicating the problem with expression.

post.description: This endpoint cancels the entire reservation and processes the refund.

200.description: Returns the updated reservation information with cancellation status and refund details.

get.description: Get the details of a flight occurrence on a specific date including status, available seats, and prices.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of the flight, such as '2024-05-02'.

get.description: Search for direct flights between two cities on a specific date.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: The origin city airport in three letters, such as 'JFK'.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The destination city airport in three letters, such as 'LAX'.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '2024-05-01'.

200.description: Successful response with a list of available flights.

prices.description: Prices for seats by cabin type.

post.summary: Update the flight information of a reservation.
post.description: Allows updating the flight details for a user's reservation.

cabin.description: The cabin type for the reservation.

flights.description: An array of objects containing details about each flight segment in the updated reservation.

date.description: The date for the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '2024-05-01'.

payment_id.description: The payment id stored in user profile, such as 'credit_card_7815826', 'gift_card_7815826', 'certificate_7815826'.

schema.description: Response JSON with the updated reservation details or error message.

get.description: Get the details of a reservation.

user_id.description: User ID associated with the reservation.

created_at.description: Timestamp for when the reservation was created.

post.description: Invoke the Think tool to process the given thought. Adds the thought to the log for complex reasoning.

200.description: The thought process completed, and the thought was appended to the log.

schema.description: The result of the thought processing.

x-input-examples.thought: Significance of May 16 in aviation history.
Reflection on effective data processing techniques.

get.description: Get the details of a user using their unique user ID.

post.description: Transfer the user to a human agent with a summary of the user's issue.

summary.description: A summary of the user's issue.

x-input-examples.summary: User cannot resolve issue with available tools.
User explicitly requested a human agent.

post.description: Send a certificate to a user. Be careful!

user_id.description: The ID of the user to book the reservation, such as 'sara_doe_496'.

200.description: Success response with the status of certificate sending.

schema.description: Detailed message of certificate addition status.

added.value: Certificate certificate_3221323 added to user mia_li_3668 with amount 100.

x-output-examples: Certificate certificate_3221323 added to user mia_li_3668 with amount 100.

get.description: Search direct flights between two cities on a specific date.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: The origin city airport code in three letters, such as 'JFK'.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The destination city airport code in three letters, such as 'LAX'.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '2024-01-01'.

200.description: List of direct flights available between the origin and destination on the specified date.

x-output-examples: Error: number of passengers does not match
post.summary: Update the passenger information for an existing reservation.

passengers.description: An array of objects containing details about each passenger.

first_name.description: The first name of the passenger, such as 'Noah'.

last_name.description: The last name of the passenger, such as 'Brown'.

dob.description: The date of birth of the passenger in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', such as '1990-01-01'.

200.description: Successful response containing the updated reservation details.

schema.description: JSON representation of the updated reservation.

passenger_mismatch.value: Error: number of passengers does not match

post.description: Update the baggage information of a reservation.

total_baggages.description: The updated total number of baggage items included in the reservation.

nonfree_baggages.description: The updated number of non-free baggage items included in the reservation.

payment_id.description: The payment id stored in user profile, such as 'credit_card_7815826', 'gift_card_7815826', 'certificate_7815826'.

200.description: The updated reservation after baggage modifications.

x-output-examples: Error: certificate cannot be used to update reservation
Error: gift card balance is not enough
